Mount_Prospect.Wheeler-Magnus Round Barn:
The Wheeler-Magnus Round Barn is located on the grounds of a retirement community in the Cook County city of Arlington Heights in the U.S. state of Illinois. It is a 50 feet (15 m) diameter barn built in approximately 1910.
It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1992 when it joined the Round Barns in Illinois Multiple Property Submission (MPS).
